doc:
Carole Shelley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carole_Shelley 0 Carole Augusta Shelley (16 August 1939 – 31 August 2018) was a British-American actress who made her career in the United States. Her many stage roles included the character of Madame Morrible in the original Broadway cast of the musical Wicked. She won the Tony Award for Best Actress in a Play for her performance in The Elephant Man in 1979. Carole_Augusta_Shelley ( 16_August_1939 – 31_August_2018 ) was a_British-American_actress who made her_career in the_United_States .
